attributes.action: Have CCTV in ALL Care/ Nursing homes (Private & State ) .
attributes.additional_details: My mother was in a Nursing Care Home for 37 weeks in West Sussex and i saw what went on , Some days not good .I spent  8-9 hours per day & talked to staff and listened  from there point of view .
attributes.background: To have CCTV in homes would create a higher standard of care for you loved one , Stop , Any abuse/Neglect from staff or relatives and would help everyone to understand the situation that occurs when a loved one is in a home . This issue could affect anyone of us in the future .
